title: Age is not the only risk for severe coronavirus disease   Livemint
description: Senior citizens undoubtedly are the hardest hit by Covid   While death rates fluctuate wildly early in an outbreak  Italy has reported more than    of deaths so far were among those   or older
content: WASHINGTON  Older people remain most at risk of dying as the new coronavirus continues its rampage around the globe  but theyre far from the only ones vulnerable  One of many mysteries  Men seem to be faring worse than women And as cases skyrocket in the U     chars
